response.original_title: and they ran out of time
response.overview: The nerds, the jocks, the chatty kids, they all become one as they head out of the school. All going to the same destination for the final time.  A short film written and directed based on a poem of the same name, the story follows two high school sweethearts coming to grips with their futures and what it means for them as they run out of time.  Chapman Dodge College Accepted Film:  This short film can be found on the YouTube Channel "Jonathan Lau"
response.tagline: "AND WITH A KISS, WE FELL OUT OF LOVE."
response.title: and they ran out of time
